name: Flappy UFO (The Wrong John)
description:
On mobile: Hit (run game) and watch the load bar load to about 90%. Then wait a bit more and the game should start.

On a computer: The images are in slightly different positions but game should still be playable.

Sound FX from The Wrong Samples

https://thewrongjohn.bandcamp.com/album/the-wrong-samples

Music Repetitions from Power Off by The Wrong John

https://thewrongjohn.bandcamp.com/album/power-off
